death_place.zh-cn: 河南省永城市陈官庄乡

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，抗战期间曾任新编第二十二师师长与第五军军长，参与昆仑关战役与滇西缅北战役。国共内战期间任第二兵团司令，在徐蚌会战中阵亡。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, posthumously promoted to General. He served as the commander of the New 22nd Division and the 5th Corps during the Second Sino-Japanese War, participating in the Battle of Kunlun Pass and the Battle of Northern Burma and Western Yunnan. During the Chinese Civil War, he commanded the 2nd Army Group and was killed in action during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，曾任国民革命军第五军军长、陆军第二兵团司令、徐州剿匪总司令部副总司令。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army, who served as the commander of the 5th Corps, the 2nd Army Group, and the deputy commander of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在第二次国共内战时期的重要作战单位。
description.en: A major combat unit of the Republic of China Armed Forces during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军的精锐机械化部队之一，在抗日战争和国共内战中战功显赫。
description.en: One of the elite mechanized units of the National Revolutionary Army, distinguished in both the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军的师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校，是国民党培养军事人才的重要机构。
description.en: The Republic of China Military Academy, a key institution for training military officers for the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国时期的高等军事院校。
description.en: A higher military academy in Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江温州的一所中学。
description.en: A middle school located in Wenzhou, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期位于上海的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Shanghai during the Republican era.

nodes.id: 纳粹德国工兵专门学校

zh-cn: 纳粹德国工兵专门学校

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国时期的一所军事工程学校。
description.en: A military engineering school in Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一。此役国民党军主力损失殆尽。
description.en: One of the three major campaigns of the Second Chinese Civil War. The main force of the Nationalist army was annihilated in this campaign.

description.zh-cn: 河南省永城市下辖乡，是徐蚌会战后期国军被围和歼灭的地点。
description.en: A township under the jurisdiction of Yongcheng, Henan Province, where the Nationalist forces were surrounded and annihilated in the late stage of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中期第二次世界大战中，中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。
description.en: The full-scale war fought in the mid-20th century between China and Japan as part of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次武装冲突。
description.en: The second armed conflict between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China within China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，中国军队为争夺战略要地昆仑关与日军展开的一场战役。
description.en: A battle fought between Chinese and Japanese forces for the strategic location of Kunlun Pass during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，中国驻印军和中国远征军在缅甸北部和云南省西部对日军进行的反攻战役。
description.en: A counter-offensive campaign launched by the Chinese Army in India and the Chinese Expeditionary Force against Japanese forces in northern Burma and western Yunnan during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间在河南东部地区进行的一场大规模战役。
description.en: A large-scale campaign fought in eastern Henan during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在豫东战役和徐蚌会战中担任华东野战军主要指挥官。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army and a key commander of the East China Field Army during the Eastern Henan and Huaihai Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，其兵团在豫东战役中被围歼。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the Republic of China Army whose army group was surrounded and annihilated in the Eastern Henan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军上将，第七兵团司令官，在徐蚌会战碾庄战役中兵败自杀。
description.en: A General of the Republic of China Army and commander of the 7th Army Group, who was defeated and committed suicide in the Nianzhuang battle of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代史上的重要政治及军事人物，曾任中华民国总统及中国国民党总裁。
description.en: A major political and military figure in modern Chinese history, who served as President of the Republic of China and Director-General of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期军事将领，长期主政云南，有“云南王”之称。
description.en: A military general during the mainland period of the Republic of China, who governed Yunnan for a long time and was known as the 'King of Yunnan'.

description.zh-cn: 邱清泉的第二任妻子。
description.en: Qiu Qingquan's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 邱清泉与叶蕤君之子，曾任上海市政协委员。
description.en: Son of Qiu Qingquan and Ye Ruijun, who served as a member of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 1879年至1952年间在中国上海的一所高等教育学府。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Shanghai, China, from 1879 to 1952.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军少将，在昆仑关战役中阵亡。
description.en: A Major General of the Imperial Japanese Army who was killed in action during the Battle of Kunlun Pass.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争初期，中日双方在南京展开的战役。
description.en: A battle fought between Chinese and Japanese forces in Nanjing during the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中的机场，为纪念邱清泉而命名。
description.en: An airport in Taichung, Taiwan, named in memory of Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中的军事基地，为纪念邱清泉而命名。
description.en: A military base in Taichung, Taiwan, named in memory of Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台7甲线上的一座桥梁，为纪念邱清泉而命名。
description.en: A bridge on Taiwan's Provincial Highway 7A, named in memory of Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，中华民国国军在徐州设立的最高指挥机关。
description.en: The supreme command headquarters established by the Republic of China Armed Forces in Xuzhou during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 邱清泉于1948年10月至1949年1月10日担任陆军第二兵团司令。
description.en: Qiu Qingquan served as the commander of the 2nd Army Group from October 1948 to January 10, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 邱清泉于1943年1月至1947年9月担任第五军军长。
description.en: Qiu Qingquan served as the commander of the 5th Corps from January 1943 to September 1947.

description.zh-cn: 邱清泉于1938年10月起担任新编第二十二师师长。
description.en: Qiu Qingquan served as the commander of the New 22nd Division starting from October 1938.

description.zh-cn: 1921年以第二名毕业于浙江省立第十中学。
description.en: Graduated second in his class from Zhejiang Provincial No. 10 Middle School in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 1922年半工半读于上海大学社会学系。
description.en: Studied at the Department of Sociology at Shanghai University on a work-study basis in 1922.

description.zh-cn: 1924年7月录入黄埔军官学校工兵科第二期。
description.en: Enrolled in the second class of the Engineering Branch at the Whampoa Military Academy in July 1924.

relationships.target: 纳粹德国工兵专门学校

description.zh-cn: 1934年考取公费留学德国，先入工兵专门学校。
description.en: In 1934, he won a government scholarship to study in Germany and first entered a specialized school for military engineers.

description.zh-cn: 在德国工兵专门学校结训后，进入柏林陆军大学受训，并于1937年毕业。
description.en: After completing his training at the specialized school for military engineers in Germany, he entered the Berlin Army University for training and graduated in 1937.

description.zh-cn: 在徐蚌会战末期的陈官庄被解放军包围，兵败阵亡。
description.en: He was surrounded by the People's Liberation Army at Chenguanzhuang in the final stage of the Huaihai Campaign, where he was defeated and killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 日军第5师团第21旅团旅团长中村正雄少将在昆仑关战役中阵亡。
description.en: Major General Nakamura Masao, commander of the 21st Brigade of the Japanese 5th Division, was killed in action during the Battle of Kunlun Pass.

description.zh-cn: 在徐蚌会战陈官庄被围期间，邱清泉所在的第二兵团归属杜聿明所主持的徐州剿匪总司令部前进指挥部指挥。
description.en: During the siege of Chenguanzhuang in the Huaihai Campaign, the 2nd Army Group commanded by Qiu Qingquan was under the command of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters' forward command post, which was headed by Du Yuming.

description.zh-cn: 在豫东战役和徐蚌会战中，邱清泉率领的国军与粟裕指挥的解放军多次交战。
description.en: In the Eastern Henan and Huaihai Campaigns, the Nationalist forces led by Qiu Qingquan repeatedly clashed with the People's Liberation Army commanded by Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 在豫东战役中，邱清泉因怀疑国防部情报有误，放缓了对被围的区寿年兵团的援助，间接导致其覆灭。
description.en: During the Eastern Henan Campaign, Qiu Qingquan, suspecting faulty intelligence from the Ministry of National Defense, slowed his relief efforts for the besieged army group of Qu Shounian, indirectly contributing to its annihilation.

description.zh-cn: 在徐蚌会战初期，奉命增援被解放军围困于碾庄地区的黄伯韬第七兵团，但未能成功。
description.en: In the early stages of the Huaihai Campaign, he was ordered to reinforce Huang Botao's 7th Army Group, which was besieged by the PLA in the Nianzhuang area, but the attempt was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 豫东战役后，蒋介石在战后检讨中认为邱清泉所部“行动迟缓，应另行议处”，对其进行批评。
description.en: After the Eastern Henan Campaign, Chiang Kai-shek criticized Qiu Qingquan in a post-battle review, stating that his unit's 'actions were slow and should be dealt with separately'.

description.zh-cn: 1945年10月3日，邱清泉率第五军奉命解除了龙云的云南省政府主席职务及其部队武装。
description.en: On October 3, 1945, Qiu Qingquan led the 5th Corps to carry out orders to remove Long Yun from his post as Chairman of the Yunnan Provincial Government and to disarm his troops.

description.zh-cn: 1929年，邱清泉在南京与叶蕤君结婚。
description.en: In 1929, Qiu Qingquan married Ye Ruijun in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 邱国渭是邱清泉的儿子。
description.en: Qiu Guowei is the son of Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 邱国渭是叶蕤君的儿子。
description.en: Qiu Guowei is the son of Ye Ruijun.

description.zh-cn: 邱国渭于1952年从圣约翰大学毕业。
description.en: Qiu Guowei graduated from St. John's University in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 台中公馆机场于1966年3月20日改名为清泉岗机场，以纪念邱清泉。
description.en: Taichung's Kung Kuan Airport was renamed Ching Chuan Kang Airport on March 20, 1966, to commemorate Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 台中装甲兵训练基地于1961年改名为清泉岗基地，以纪念邱清泉。
description.en: The Taichung Armor Training Base was renamed Ching Chuan Kang Base in 1961 to commemorate Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 台7甲线上的清泉桥于1954年4月3日完工，其命名为纪念邱清泉。
description.en: The Ching Chuan Bridge on Taiwan's Provincial Highway 7A, completed on April 3, 1954, was named in memory of Qiu Qingquan.

description.zh-cn: 在徐蚌会战期间，第二兵团隶属于徐州剿匪总司令部指挥。
description.en: During the Huaihai Campaign, the 2nd Army Group was under the command of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression General Headquarters.
